channel.title: Need help adding new Npcs to Allstar source
channel.description:
Im working on a project with an allstar source. Got the crazy idea that maybe an allstar could be brought into the new age of Rsps. Old dog new tricks ya know. lol
Anyways im still a beginner coder, also thought I could get some experience with this. My main problem is I want to add alot of new npcs, bosses and such, probably revanants for pvp armours. Stuff like that.
If i could get some help it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Need help adding new Npcs to Allstar source
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

Yeah its the client and source locations that I add the codes into that I donâ€™t know and havent been able to figure out.
Do you know the locations i would do the editing?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Angel_Carlos wrote:

oh lol you have to download or make your own npcs.

then add it on a class java file and add all the info to server source

item.title: Need help adding new Npcs to Allstar source
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

Well against what some people would suggest i dont plan on making the armours degrade.
But I know how to write ints for armours and weapons, i can do all that.
And im pretty sure its not just autospawn to add new npcs.
Allstar is so old that it has chaos elemental, kbd, and kalphite queen as the bosses, thats it.
So by adding new npcs i mean to actually add them into the server so that they even exist, the spawning i can handle.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding new Npcs to Allstar source

also adding pvp armour you need the files and codes for it
